text: Put that picture and tell me everything that you see going on in that picture, everything that's happening. Mm-hmm. A lot of things are happening. Yes. The water's going over, the water's overflowing, and the little boy is slipping off the stool while he's trying to steal some cookies. The little girl is laughing at him and she's not helping him get in there. And the lady is drying the dishes. And looking out the window. Beautiful out there. Must be June. I don't know but anyhow it looks like it's not winter. .. Mmm. That's about all I can see. Yeah, that's
